mdRecord.dcterms:title: The orphan's legacy; or, A testamentary abridgment. In three parts. I. Of last wills and testaments. II. Of executors and administrators. III. Of legacies and devises. Wherein the most material points of law relating to that subject, are succinctly treated, as well according to the common and temporal, as ecclesiastical and civil laws of this realm. Illustrated with a great variety of select cases in the law of both professions.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Godolphin, John, 1617-1678
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by the assigns of Richard and Edward Atkins, for Robert Vincent
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Wills--Great Britain
Executors and administrators--Great Britain
